ArrayOfString.string: SELECT MAX(age) AS Max, MIN(age) AS Min, AVG(age) AS Avg FROM (SELECT (DATEDIFF(hour,BirthDate,GETDATE())/8766) AS age FROM Northwind.dbo.Employees WHERE Employees.City='London') AS Myselect
SELECT City, AVG(DATEDIFF(MONTH, BirthDate, GETDATE())/12) AS "Age" FROM Northwind.dbo.Employees GROUP BY City HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF(MONTH, BirthDate, GETDATE())/12) > 60
SELECT TOP 3 FirstName, LastName, (DATEDIFF(MONTH, BirthDate, GETDATE())/12) AS Age FROM Northwind.dbo.Employees ORDER BY Age DESC
SELECT FirstName, LastName, BirthDate FROM Northwind.dbo.Employees WHERE BirthDate IN (SELECT MONTH(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))

SELECT FirstName, LastName, COUNT(*) as 'Orders Count' FROM Northwind.dbo.Employees LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Orders ON (Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID AND YEAR(OrderDate)=1997) GROUP BY FirstName, LastName

SELECT FirstName, LastName, COUNT(*) as 'Orders Count' FROM Northwind.dbo.Employees LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Orders ON (Orders.EmployeeID = Employees.EmployeeID AND YEAR(Orders.OrderDate)=1997 AND Orders.ShippedDate > Orders.RequiredDate GROUP BY FirstName, LastName

SELECT Customers.ContactName, COUNT(*) as 'Orders Count' FROM Northwind.dbo.Customers LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Orders ON (Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID AND Customers.Country='France') GROUP BY Customers.ContactName HAVING COUNT(*) > 1

SELECT Customers.ContactName FROM Northwind.dbo.Customers LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Orders ON (Orders.CustomerID=Customers.CustomerID) LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.[Order Details] ON (Orders.OrderID=[Order Details].OrderID) LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Products ON (Products.ProductID=[Order Details].ProductID) WHERE ProductName='Tofu'

SELECT Customers.ContactName as 'Orders Count' FROM Northwind.dbo.Customers LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Orders ON (Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID AND Customers.Country='France') LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.[Order Details] ON (Orders.OrderID=[Order Details].OrderID) LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Products ON (Products.ProductID=[Order Details].ProductID) LEFT JOIN Northwind.dbo.Suppliers ON (Products.SupplierID=Suppliers.SupplierID AND Suppliers.Country!='France') GROUP BY Customers.ContactName
